desc: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. Topics are determined by the instructor and may relate to his/her research interests. Prerequisite: determined by instructor. Offered in 2011-12 and alternate years.
name: Directed Research
prerequisites: Prerequisite: determined by instructor. Offered in 2011-12 and alternate years.
title: Directed Undergraduate Research
